DOC.brief_summary: This is a Phase II, open-label, multicenter, single-arm, exploratory "proof of concept" study. Diflomotecan (7 mg fixed dose) will be administered as a 20-minute IV infusion once every 3 weeks in patients with sensitive small cell lung cancer (SCLC) with progressive disease after first-line treatment with a platinum-based regimen.
DOC.brief_title: Diflomotecan (BN80915) Administered Once Every 3 Weeks in Treating Patients With Sensitive Small Cell Lung Cancer (SCLC)
DOC.criteria: Main Documented small cell lung cancer (SCLC) Measurable disease One line of previous chemotherapy, including any platinum analogue, and excluding any camptothecin analogues, with objective response and relapsed no less than 3 months Main Uncontrollable brain metastasis Treated with an investigational drug within 30 days
